00019 #include "graph.h"
00020 #include "graphwidget.h"

00022 #include "ui_caltableform.h"
00023 #include "ui_graphnurlform.h"

00026 
00027 XConCalTable::XConCalTable
00028 (const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &list, FrmCalTable *form)
00029     :  XQConnector(list, form), 
00030        m_list(list),
00031        m_display(createOrphan<XNode>("display") ),
00032        m_temp(createOrphan<XDoubleNode>("temp") ),
00033        m_value(createOrphan<XDoubleNode>("value") ),
00034        m_thermometer(createOrphan<XItemNode<XThermometerList, XThermometer> >(
00035                          "thermometer", false, list, true) ),
00036        m_conThermo(xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_thermometer, (QComboBox *)form->cmbThermometer) ),
00037        m_conTemp(xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_temp, form->edTemp, false)),
00038        m_conValue(xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_value, form->edValue, false)),
00039        m_conDisplay(xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_display, form->btnDisplay)),
00040        m_pForm(form),
00041        m_waveform(new FrmGraphNURL(g_pFrmMain)),
00042        m_wave(createOrphan<XWaveNGraph>("Waveform", true, m_waveform.get()))
00043 {
00044     m_lsnTemp = temp()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00045         shared_from_this(),
00046         &XConCalTable::onTempChanged);
00047     m_lsnValue = value()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00048         shared_from_this(),
00049         &XConCalTable::onValueChanged);
00050     m_lsnDisplay = display()->onTouch().connectWeak(
00051         shared_from_this(),
00052         &XConCalTable::onDisplayTouched, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00053 
00054     m_waveform->setWindowTitle(i18n("Thermometer Calibration"));
00055     {
00056         const char *labels[] = {"Temp. [K]", "Value", "T(v(T))-T [K]"};
00057         m_wave->setColCount(3, labels);
00058         m_wave->insertPlot(labels[1], 0, 1);
00059         m_wave->insertPlot(labels[2], 0, -1, 2);
00060         m_wave->plot(0)->label()->value(i18n("Curve"));
00061         m_wave->plot(0)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00062         m_wave->plot(1)->label()->value(i18n("Error"));
00063         m_wave->plot(1)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00064         shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = m_wave->axisx();
00065         axisx->logScale()->value(true);
00066         shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = m_wave->axisy();
00067         axisy->logScale()->value(true);
00068         m_wave->clear();
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 void
00073 XConCalTable::onTempChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00074 {
00075     shared_ptr<XThermometer> thermo = *thermometer();
00076     if(!thermo) return;
00077     double ret = thermo->getRawValue(*temp());
00078     m_lsnValue->mask();
00079     value()->value(ret);    
00080     m_lsnValue->unmask();
00081 }
00082 void
00083 XConCalTable::onValueChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00084 {
00085     shared_ptr<XThermometer> thermo = *thermometer();
00086     if(!thermo) return;
00087     double ret = thermo->getTemp(*value());
00088     m_lsnTemp->mask();
00089     temp()->value(ret);
00090     m_lsnTemp->unmask();
00091 }
00092 void
00093 XConCalTable::onDisplayTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00094 {
00095     shared_ptr<XThermometer> thermo = *thermometer();
00096     if(!thermo) {
00097         m_wave->clear();
00098         return;
00099     }
00100     const int length = 1000;
00101     double step = (log(*thermo->tempMax()) - log(*thermo->tempMin())) / length;
00102     {   XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_wave);
00103     m_wave->setRowCount(length);
00104     double lt = log(*thermo->tempMin());
00105     for(int i = 0; i < length; i++)
00106     {
00107         double t = exp(lt);
00108         double r = thermo->getRawValue(t);
00109         m_wave->cols(0)[i] = t;
00110         m_wave->cols(1)[i] = r;
00111         m_wave->cols(2)[i] = thermo->getTemp(r) - t;
00112         lt += step;
00113     }
00114     }
00115     m_waveform->show();
00116     m_waveform->raise();  
00117 }
